subject: Order #SSN2549 – Missing Items
description_text:
Order #SSN2549 – Missing Items

Hi,


I recently ordered the Pro X Ultra pedals with haptic feedback and a pedal plate. The order was split into two shipments.


  *   The first delivery (last week) included the Pro X Ultra pedals with the black and carbon fibre pedal plate.
  *   I assumed the second delivery would contain the haptic vibration parts (Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motors) for all three pedals.



However, today I received only another pedal plate, this time in silver. I am still missing the three Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motors that I ordered, and we are now past the original delivery timeframe.


Could you please update me on the status of the missing items and confirm when I can expect them?


Thank you,

Fraser o'brien


Sent from Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>

conversations.body_text: ID 为 3797 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单3797  
      主题: Order #SSN2549 – Missing Items  
      描述:  
 

 
 
Order #SSN2549 – Missing Items
 
  
 
 Hi, 
  
 
 I recently ordered the Pro X Ultra pedals with haptic feedback and a pedal plate. The order was split into two shipments. 
  
 
 
 
The first delivery (last week) included the Pro X Ultra pedals with the black and carbon fibre pedal plate. 
 
I assumed the second delivery would contain the haptic vibration parts (Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motors) for all three pedals. 
 
  
 
  
 
 However, today I received only another pedal plate, this time in silver. I am still missing the three Simsonn VAM Pro Linear
 Motors that I ordered, and we are now past the original delivery timeframe. 
  
 
 Could you please update me on the status of the missing items and confirm when I can expect them? 
  
 
 Thank you, 
 Fraser o'brien  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Sent from
Outlook for iOS
Hi Fraser O'Brien,     This is the tracking link for the VAM Pro haptic parts in your order. I see it has been delivered – have you received it? https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045893110379

Hi
the parcel was delivered but it wasn’t the haptic parts it was a steel pedal plate so it looks like you’ve sent me that instead of the haptic parts

Sent from Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________

Hi Fraser O'Brien,    We sincerely apologise for the inconvenience caused. We shall arrange for a replacement to be dispatched immediately. Here is your parcel tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045916276769  Additionally, we kindly request photographs of the incorrect parcel for our records.

Please find attached the images of the incorrect parcel. Let me know if you need any further details.

Could you also confirm the expected timeframe for receiving the haptic motors?



Sent from Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________

Attachment(s) that exceed the 20 MB limit have been dropped. Please reach out to the sender.
Thank you for your information. Your package is expected to arrive on the 21st.

Hi they just arrived I got them plugged in a working for a brief time but when I put the power supply into the box I got a few sparks coming out of it and now when everything is plugged in on the simsonn dashboard it says the motors don’t have power connected

Sent from Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________

Hi Fraser O'Brien,    It is normal for a spark to appear when plugging in the controller. This happens because the three large capacitors for the motor control are charging, and it will not cause any damage to the mainboard. Also, 24V is within the normal installation voltage range.  In addition, please also consider the possibility of insufficient power supply:    We recommend using the rear USB 3.0 port of your computer as the power source;    Or using a USB hub with independent power supply.    You can also try disconnecting both the USB and the power, then reconnect the USB first, followed by the power supply. If the issue persists, please feel free to contact me and I will assist you further.
